Package danfulea.phys.egs

Package used for core EGSnrc implementation.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    EgsQuestion
    The interface for implementing the sensitive routines for Monte Carlo simulation of radiation transport based on EGS4/EGSnrc simulation toolkit.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BremsApp
    Demo class for XRAy spectra simulations!!!!
    EGS4
    Utility class for Monte-Carlo simulation of photon-electron transport.
    EGS4Core
    Core class for Monte Carlo simulation of photon-electorn transport.
    EGS4emf
    Utility class for handling the effect of external electromagnetic field (EMF) upon electron interaction with matter.
    EGS4Geom
    Utility class for handling basic geometry (cylindrical RZ or spherical).
    EGS4Grid
    Utility class for output results.
    EGS4Macro
    Utility class for EGS4, EGS4 core engine and for custom user applications.
    EGS4SrcEns
    Utility class for handling particle sources and particle energy (mono-energetic or spectrum).
    G
    Class for calculation of the energy fraction lost to radiation when electrons slow down, if the incident beam is photons, or the radiative yield, if the incident beam is electrons.
    Graph
    Class for Graphics (as in Plot).
    PEGS4
    Prepare medium input data for EGS (Electron Gamma Shower).
    PEGS4A
    This class is designed to initialize and perform PEGS specific tasks in order to prepare medium input data for EGS (Electron Gamma Shower).
    PEGS4AGraph
    Plot cross sections computed in PEGS4A/PEGS4.

Package danfulea.phys.egs Description

Package used for core EGSnrc implementation. Monte-Carlo simulation of radiation transport is described here.
Version:
2.0
Author:
Dan Fulea
